detail_desc: Pyjama shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. One patterned pair.
5-pocket corduroy trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Jersey blouse with an opening at the top with ties at the front, a seam with a drawstring under the bust, and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves.
Aviator style glasses with metal frames and clear lenses.
Trousers in sturdy, stretch jersey. High waist with concealed elastication and a concealed zip fly with a safety button in the waistband. Tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a square neckline at the front, a deep neckline at the back and short sleeves.
Patterned swimsuit with a small stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard at the front, long raglan sleeves and short legs. Lined. UPF 50.
Leggings in soft, stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved all-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with press-stud fastenings.
Swim shorts in a block-coloured stretch weave with lacing and elastication at the waist, a fly with a hook and loop fastening and side pockets. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Calf-length dress in a patterned jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Pleats that taper at the waist, a concealed zip at the back, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow, close-fitting, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft viscose jersey with decorative crossover straps at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Soft, non-wired bra in satin and mesh with mesh-lined cups with decorative stitching. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that double at the front, and a wide fastening at the back with four pairs of hooks and eyes.
Long-sleeved blouse in lace with an opening with a button at the back of the neck and seamed cuffs.
Jumper in a soft, chunky knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt side pockets. Lined.
Fitted coat in soft bouclé with a zip down the front and patch pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Sleeveless top in soft, gently draping silk with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck front and a narrow cut at the back. Lined.
Shirt jacket in sturdy cotton twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, patch front pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved romper suit in soft, striped organic cotton jersey with buttons at the top and a chest pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves and hems.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Playsuit in an airy organic cotton weave with buttons at the top and flutter sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and pockets in the side seams.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated waist with a tasselled drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastic at the hems.
Joggers in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Short, fitted dress in stretch, sequined jersey with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves with gathers for added volume. Lined.

Sports trousers in a rustle weave made from recycled polyester. High waist with wide, covered elastication and an elastic drawstring. Side pockets and tapered legs with an elastic drawstring at the hems.
Thin metal Alice band decorated with ball-shaped plastic beads.

Blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, button placket and chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in waffled jersey with a motif on the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft viscose jersey.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft modal and cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck and long sleeves.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and straight hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight hems.
Lace suspender belt for holding up nylon stockings. Elastication at the top and an adjustable fastening at the back.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Playsuit in a softly draping viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a turtleneck and long sleeves. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a double-layered drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Poncho in a soft knit containing glittery threads with a ribbed polo neck and fringed hem.
Knee-length dress in heavily draping jersey crêpe with a V-neck, cap sleeves and a wrapover front with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined front.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in a soft viscose weave. Shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front and long, cuffed sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist and contrasting colour trims. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Metal earrings with a pendant in the shape of a flower. Length 7.5 cm.
Block-coloured top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Set with a hat, tube scarf and gloves in a soft, fine knit. Hat with a ribbed turn-up at the hem and pompom on top. Scarf with a twisted detail. Gloves with double-layered ribbing at the cuffs.
Short shorts in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently rounded hems with short slits in the sides.

Calf-length dress in softly draping satin with a sheen. V-neck, wide ties that cross at the front and tie at the back, long gathered sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip at the back and a flared skirt with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Rings in various designs made from recycled zinc.
Short imitation suede skirt with a high paper bag waist.
Lace bandeau bras with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Silicone trim at the top and a mesh-lined front.
Twill shorts in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and low crotch. Side pockets, an open back pocket and flap leg pockets with press-studs.

Jumpsuit in slightly stretchy imitation leather with a brushed inside. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a collar, zip at the top, flap chest pockets and diagonal side pockets. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt.
iPhone case in grained imitation leather with three card compartments inside, a magnetic fastener and detachable wrist strap. Fits iPhone 6s/6/7/8.
3/4-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a fake fly, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with a short slit at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Waist bag with a zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Size 6x13x19 cm.
Striped pyjamas in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
V-neck T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a lightly padded shaft with elastic gores in the sides. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Sports bra in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and wide elastic at the hem. Lined at the front. Medium support.
Slipover in a soft cotton knit with a V-neck and ribbed hem.
Knee-length tunic in a viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Narrow ties under the bust and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Rain coat in water-repellent functional fabric with a drawstring hood, press-studs down the front and side pockets. Long raglan sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined. The coat can be folded and packed easily into the drawstring storage bag it is supplied with. Size of bag 9x21 cm. The coat has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Bikini. Top with a lined front and narrow, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps. Bottoms with a lined gusset. The bikini lining is made of recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved top in glittery, lightweight jersey with crossover straps at the top of the back. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Leather sandals with straps with metal buckles at the top and a strap with a hook and loop fastening around the heel. Fabric linings, suede insoles and textured thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Sleeveless body in jersey containing glittery threads in a narrow cut at the top with an opening front and back. Small stand-up collar with hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck, and press-studs at the crotch.
Short vest top in cotton jersey with a tie at the hem and raw-edge armholes.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.

Soft, non-wired nursing bras in soft, stretch fabric with lined cups and a wrapover front for easier nursing access. No fasteners. The bras are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

Short, straight-cut dress in a lightweight, patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, long, wide, cuffed sleeves and a seam at the hem with wide flounces. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a sweetheart neckline. Long puff sleeves with gathers and elastication at the shoulders for added volume, and a seam at the waist.
